name: Konrad the Alchemist
description:
You didn't hear anything about the invasion attempt, did you? The dead army attacked the earth with their commander, the death himself. In the meantime, you did mind your own business. Because a young man, Konrad, who studies alchemy in his spare time, faced with them. To save his home, he saved the earth.

Konrad the alchemist is an action-puzzle game with RPG elements. Farm resources, cast alchemy spells and take undead creatures' lives for the second time. Current version includes;

- 12 spells
- 13 monsters (including the death as boss)
- 100+ upgrades
- 3 game modes (In addition to story mode, "Skeleton Defence" and "Free Run")

Enjoy the game :)
